scripts.distinstall: cd dist && npm init -y && npm install express bufferutil utf-8-validate node-media-server
scripts.moveqttodist: cd deploy/win32/build/ConsoleStreamingServer && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.readdirSync('.').filter((file) => file.startsWith('Qt') && file.endsWith('.dll')).forEach((dll) => { fs.rename(dll, 'dist/'+dll, () => {}) });"
scripts.build:win32: npm run webpack && npm run distinstall && npm run modulelicenses && npm run pkgdns && npm run copyassets && npm run nodeguipack && npm run moveqttodist && npm run renamewin32 && npm run licensewin32
scripts.build:linux: npm run webpack && npm run distinstall && npm run modulelicenses && npm run pkgdns && npm run copyassets && npm run nodeguipacklinux && npm run renamelinux && npm run licenselinux
scripts.build:darwin: npm run webpack && npm run distinstall && npm run modulelicenses && npm run pkgdns && npm run copyassets && npm run nodeguipack && npm run licensedarwin
